verses.verse: "Do you think <WH2803> this to be your right, <WH4941> or do you say, <WH559> <WH6664> 'My righteousness is more than God <WH410>'s,'
That you ask, <WH559> <WH5532> 'What advantage will it be to you? <WH3276> What profit shall I have, <WH2403> more than if I had sinned?'
I will answer <WH7725> you, <WH7453> and your companions with you.
Look <WH5027> to the heavens, <WH8064> and see. <WH7200> See <WH7789> the skies, <WH7834> which are higher than you. <WH1361>
If you have sinned, <WH2398> what effect do <WH6466> you have against him? <WH6588> If your transgressions are multiplied, <WH7231> what do you do to him? <WH6213>
If you are righteous, <WH6663> what do you give <WH5414> him? <WH3947> Or what does he receive from your hand? <WH3027>
Your wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as you are, <WH6666> and your righteousness may profit a son <WH1121> of man. <WH120>
"By reason of the multitude <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they cry out. <WH7768> They cry <WH2199> for help by reason of the arm <WH2220> of the mighty. <WH7227>
But none says, <WH559> <WH433> 'Where is God my Maker, <WH6213> who gives <WH5414> songs <WH2158> in the night, <WH3915>
who teaches <WH502> us more than the animals <WH929> of the earth, <WH776> and makes us wiser <WH2449> than the birds <WH5775> of the sky? <WH8064>'
There they cry, <WH6817> but none gives answer, <WH6030> because <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil men. <WH7451>
Surely God <WH410> will not hear <WH8085> an empty <WH7723> cry, <WH7706> neither will the Almighty regard it. <WH7789>
How <WH637> much less when you say <WH559> you don't <WH7789> see him. <WH1779> The cause is before <WH6440> him, <WH2342> and you wait for him!
But now, <WH6485> because he has not visited in his anger, <WH639> neither does he greatly <WH3966> regard <WH3045> arrogance. <WH6580>
Therefore Job <WH347> opens <WH6475> his mouth <WH6310> with empty <WH1892> talk, <WH3527> and he multiplies words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge. <WH1847>"
